SA11sanss11u:1_0: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:3_0: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanss11u:4_0: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam anuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim //
SA11sanss11u:5_0: ye kāma varjenti yathâgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanss11u:6_0: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ //
SA11sanss11u:7_0: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇâsīd anāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanss11u:11_0: jyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:12_0: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām //
SA11sanss11u:14_0: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
SA11sanss11u:15_0: nôpasthitā bhonti narôttamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān //
SA11sanss11u:16_0: yaś câiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvârtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:17_0: araṇyâbhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
SA11sanss11u:18_0: yadi punar visabhāgasatvânunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhâdikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta /
SA11sanss11u:21_0: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
SA11sanss11u:22_0: mamântike cêti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam //
SA11sanss11u:23_0: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanss11u:24_0: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ //
SA11sanss11u:25_0: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanss11u:26_0: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ //
SA11sanss11u:27_0: sahadhārmikeno vacanenôktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ câpratyayaṃ ca /
SA11sanss11u:28_0: prāviṣkarontîmi bāladharmêmam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti //
SA11sanss11u:29_0: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathâmedhyenâmedhya sārddham /
SA11sanss11u:30_0: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe //
SA11sanss11u:32_0: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyâpriya nâsti kahiṃcit /
SA11sanss11u:33_0: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti //
SA11sanss11u:36_0: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yathêva vrajanti //
SA11sanss11u:38_0: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
SA11sanss11u:39_0: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ nô ca priyâpriya vidyati saṃgo //
SA11sanss11u:40_0: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo /
SA11sanss11u:41_0: antôbhe 'pi tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme //
SA11sanss11u:43_0: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā /
SA11sanss11u:46_0: kadāci yuktayogîmi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
SA11sanss11u:47_0: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke /
SA11sanss11u:48_0: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ //
SA11sanss11u:49_0: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sadôpaśāntarato vivekacārī /
SA11sanss11u:50_0: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
SA11sanss11u:51_0: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām /
SA11sanss11u:52_0: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'syêmi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve //
SA11sanss11u:54_0: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
SA11sanss11u:55_0: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram /
SA11sanss11u:60_0: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntêndriyāḥ sūratāḥ //
SA11sanss11u:61_0: na strīsaṃbhava nâiva câpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate /
SA11sanss11u:63_0: lābhair nâpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca /
SA11sanss11u:67_0: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayâikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānîty ādi //
SA11sanss11u:68_0: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhâdau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sâivâikaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:71_0: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatôdakârṇavenôhyamānôdakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād /
SA11sanss11u:72_0: evam eva kāśyapêhâike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti /
SA11sanss11u:79_0: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nâtidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati na
SA11sanss11u:82_0: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpâyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yā-
SA11sanss11u:84_0: ni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny advitīyāni tādṛśāni sthānāny āśrayet /
SA11sanss11u:85_0: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya svâdhyāyati nâtyuccena svareṇa nâtinīcena nôddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
SA11sanss11u:86_0: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vôpasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vânye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /
SA11sanss11u:93_0: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /
SA11sanss11u:95_0: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntêndriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanôpasaṃhartavyā /
SA11sanss11u:98_0: sacet saṃvegânukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārôdārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
SA11sanss11u:100_0: sâivaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ /
SA11sanss11u:101_0: te ca satvās tasyântike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti //
SA11sanss11u:104_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye prativasatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:113_0: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyârthāyâraṇye prativasāmi sa mayârthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyârthaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:114_1: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:127_0: anitye nityêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nātmany ātmêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto /
SA11sanss11u:132_0: lābhasatkārabhayabhīto 'kālamantrabhayabhīto 'dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭam iti bhayabhīto 'śrute śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto 'vijñāte vijñātam iti bhayabhīto 'śramaṇe śramaṇamadabhayabhīto 'nyonyavidveṣaṇabhayabhītaḥ kāmadhāturūpadhātvarūpyadhātubhayabhītaḥ sarvabhavagatyupapattibhayabhīto nirayatiryagyonipitṛviṣayabhayabhītaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa sarvebhyo 'kuśalebhyo manasikārebhyo bhayabhī
SA11sanss11u:133_0: tâibhyo hy aham evaṃrūpebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo bhīto 'raṇyâvāsam upagataḥ //
SA11sanss11u:135_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:136_0: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhatôtpadyante //
SA11sanss11u:138_0: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nâtmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nâtmâbhiniveśaṃ nâtmaparigrahaṃ nâtmanidānaṃ nâtmatṛṣṇāṃ nâtmasaṃjñāṃ nâtmavādôpādānaṃ nâtmadṛ-
SA11sanss11u:142_0: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nâsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
SA11sanss11u:145_0: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ //
SA11sanss11u:147_0: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nôttrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanss11u:148_0: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā /
SA11sanss11u:151_0: ko 'sminn uttrasyati /tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ yoniśaḥ kāyôpaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:152_0: nâsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
SA11sanss11u:156_0: evam evâmamenâparigraheṇâraṇyam eva sarvadharmêti jñātvôpasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:160_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhânujñāto 'raṇyavāsêti jñātvâraṇye vastavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:164_0: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatvôddeśasvâdhyāyârthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
SA11sanss11u:165_0: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenâcāryôpādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam analasena svayaṃkāriṇâparôpatāpinā na ca tenôpasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:167_0: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya sa-
SA11sanss11u:169_0: mārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA11sanss11u:170_0: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
SA11sanss11u:174_0: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:175_0: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:177_0: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmânugraho naśyati /
SA11sanss11u:178_0: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss11u:181_0: sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇârthikâcāryôpādhyāyadarśanârthiko vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmântikaṃ śayanâsanam āgacchet tena sâyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya ca cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:182_0: sacet punar asya parapratibaddhôddeśaḥ svâdhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatâraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:183_0: eṣâiva tasyâraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā câtṛptêti //
SA11sanss11u:185_0: yadi punar asya tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgâgaccheyuḥ /
SA11sanss11u:186_0: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:191_0: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss11u:192_0: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
SA11sanss11u:194_0: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss11u:195_0: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayâmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti /
SA11sanss11u:196_0: pe //yadi punas tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'manuṣyôpasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
SA11sanss11u:201_0: tatra tenâraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmâdhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ-
SA11sanss11u:204_0: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sâraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
SA11sanss11u:205_0: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyâśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:207_0: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadâdhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss11u:210_0: pe //tena tatrâraṇyâyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:212_0: yathâiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
SA11sanss11u:215_0: evam evâyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsôpamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyôtpadyate /
SA11sanss11u:217_0: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramârthata*utpadyate vā nirudhyate vêti //
SA11sanss11u:221_0: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
SA11sanss11u:222_0: api tu khalu punaḥ santîme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittâśayaṃ jānanti /
SA11sanss11u:224_0: so 'ham ihâraṇyâyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11sanss11u:225_0: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgatâiko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:226_0: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vâkuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:228_0: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantîti //
